armor - package armor
 
Armor - Class in armor
An armor protects the player against a certain amount of damage when he is attacked by a monster.
Armor(String, int, double) - Constructor for class armor.Armor
Creates a new armor for the player.
ArmorFactory - Class in armor
The ArmorFactory class let the game generates different types of armors.
ArmorFactory() - Constructor for class armor.ArmorFactory
 
armorFactory() - Method in class test.ArmorTest
 
ArmorSlime - Class in armor
The SlimeArmor protects the player against all damage if the monster attacking is a slime.
ArmorSlime(String, int, double) - Constructor for class armor.ArmorSlime
Creates a new slime armor.
ArmorTest - Class in test
